name: Court Favor
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You court the fey for their aid in your endeavors. Roll 1d6 + your spellcasting stat. Add this number to any roll you choose for the duration.

Each time you add the number to a roll, reduce it by 1. The spell ends when it reaches 0.

Attempting to cast this spell again before you complete a rest will result in a chilly reception. You roll 1d6 only and do not add your spellcasting stat.
empower: Choose one - die roll increased to 1d12, or range becomes 30 feet and your target gains the effects of the spell instead of you.
